item.title: Master Ownership in Interviews 🚀 • Share concrete achievements with metrics. • Use: “I led a team of X, increasing Y by Z%.” • Describe challenges and how you overcame them. • Highlight proactive initiatives you started. How will you demonstrate ownership in your next interview? #interview #career #CareerForward #CareerFocused #CareerForge
